ModMetaData.description:
[h1] Gravship Launch Info[/h1] [b]An info display for your gravship showing launch important information at a glance:[/b] [list] [*] time until next launch [*] current gravship capabilities [*] missing ship components [*] connected substructure exceeds limit [*] missing fuel [*] not installed engine [/list]
Current included translations: [list] [*] English [*] German [*] Simplified Chinese [/list]
Are you missing a setting, feature, translation? Are you experiencing errors? Feel free to report this here or on GitHub!
You can find the non-steam version and source code here:[url=https://github.com/mb80/GravshipInfo/releases/latest] GitHub link [/url]
